attributes.action: Take action on climate change & global warming, we don't have time to wait.
attributes.additional_details:
As said by Sir David Attenborough, we have just 20 years (At most) to change our ways before we hit a tipping point. It is at this point that we will have triggered an irreversible chain of events that will become the start of the end of life as we know it. 
David Attenborough’s show; Climate change the facts.

Carbon Dioxide Graph (NASA):

My discussion on the matter and things I propose we can do to help.
attributes.background: Over the last century, carbon dioxide levels in the atmosphere have risen dramatically, 60 years ago, there was roughly 315ppm of carbon dioxide, now however there’s over 400ppm. That’s an increasing of nearly 30%. This is having an impact on all aspects of the life on a global scale.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. 

We understand that you're concerned about climate change, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
